RelatedSentence: CANNES , France ( AP ) - Famed British artist Damien Hirst has created a gilded woolly mammoth skeleton encased in a gold tank to be auctioned off at the annual amfAR Cinema Against AIDS gala this week .
Titled Gone but not Forgotten , the three - meter mammal joins Hirst 's famous shark in formaldehyde and bisected cow in his Natural History series .
The one - of - a kind piece is expected to raise millions of dollars for the charity 's work in the fight against AIDS .
